thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great room
thread.title_full: Great room - Review of BEST WESTERN Premier Louvre Saint Honore, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SC1982
title: Great room
text: Very cute room, centrally located. Interior of room was very clean. Would have given 5 stars but housekeeping left the balcony of our littered with cigarette butts which I thought was pretty gross. Pillow case had some tears in it. Despite those two little things it is a great hotel and would return.
